alert.note: Alert for Allen; Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 31 at 4:48PM CDT until July 31 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Jefferson Davis Parish in southwestern Louisiana... South central Allen Parish in southwestern Louisiana... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 447 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kinder, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kinder, Fenton, Leblanc, and Buller. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
